headline: Tim Walz Is Harris’s Choice for Vice President
description: Vice President Kamala Harris announced today that she had selected Gov. Tim Walz of Minnesota as her running mate, betting that his Midwestern appeal and plain-spoken attacks on Republicans will help her defeat Donald Trump on Election Day.
newsletter_headline: Tim Walz Is Harris’s Choice for Vice President
newsletter_sub_hed: Also, Debby is bringing historic levels of rain to the Southeast. Here’s the latest at the end of Tuesday.

headline: Debby is bringing historic levels of rain to the Southeast
description: Tropical Storm Debby is delivering massive rainfall to the Southeast after hitting Florida as a Category 1 hurricane.

headline: Hamas appointed a new political leader
description: Hamas announced that Yahya Sinwar, presumed mastermind of the Oct. 7 attacks, will lead the group's political office, succeeding the assassinated Ismail Haniyeh.

headline: A decline in homeless veterans hints at broader solutions
description: Since 2008, the number of homeless veterans in the U.S. has fallen by more than half, attributed to a federal program providing rental aid, which may offer insights into solving wider homelessness issues.
